<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-typestreammerger-cpp-"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Implementation of CodeView type stream merging.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A CodeView type stream is a series of records that reference each other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// through type indices. A type index is either &quot;simple&quot;, meaning it is less</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// than 4096 and refers to a builtin type, or it is complex, meaning it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// refers to a prior type record in the current stream. The type index of a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// record is equal to the number of records before it in the stream plus</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 0x1000.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Type records are only allowed to use type indices smaller than their own, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a type stream is effectively a topologically sorted DAG. Cycles occurring in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the type graph of the source program are resolved with forward declarations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of composite types. This class implements the following type stream merging</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// algorithm, which relies on this DAG structure:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Begin with a new empty stream, and a new empty hash table that maps from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   type record contents to new type index.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - For each new type stream, maintain a map from source type index to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   destination type index.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - For each record, copy it and rewrite its type indices to be valid in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   destination type stream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - If the new type record is not already present in the destination stream</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   hash table, append it to the destination type stream, assign it the next</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   type index, and update the two hash tables.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - If the type record already exists in the destination stream, discard it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   and update the type index map to forward the source type index to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   existing destination type index.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// As an additional complication, type stream merging actually produces two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// streams: an item (or IPI) stream and a type stream, as this is what is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// actually stored in the final PDB. We choose which records go where by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// looking at the record kind.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-typestreammerger-cpp-/typestreammerger"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-typestreammerger-cpp-/typestreammerger/#ae9228fb82c65a47ff4aa0708502d80b1">TypeStreamMerger</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-typestreammerger-cpp-/typestreammerger/#ae9228fb82c65a47ff4aa0708502d80b1"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">explicit</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-typestreammerger-cpp-/typestreammerger/#ae9228fb82c65a47ff4aa0708502d80b1">TypeStreamMerger</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;TypeIndex&gt;</a> &amp;SourceToDest)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : IndexMap(SourceToDest) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When dealing with precompiled headers objects, all data in SourceToDest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// belongs to the precompiled headers object, and is assumed to be already</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remapped to the target PDB. Any forthcoming type that will be merged in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// might potentially back-reference this data. We also don&#39;t want to resolve</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// twice the types in the precompiled object.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurIndex += SourceToDest.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-typestreammerger-cpp-/typestreammerger/#a7568fd1d6a96e85835530d9e2d51a6ce"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/typeindex">TypeIndex</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-typestreammerger-cpp-/typestreammerger/#a7568fd1d6a96e85835530d9e2d51a6ce">Untranslated</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Local hashing entry points</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// outside the current type stream, and this is a corrupt record.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsSecondPass &amp;&amp; MapPos &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msgpack/#afdae9da66bac09f4b2bfc0fd9f0559e6a46f3ea056caa3126b91f3f70beea068c">Map</a>.size()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Print a more useful error. We can give the current record and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// index that we think its pointing to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LastError)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastError = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a71210b99d2ef87236d8505c1771a7ab1">joinErrors</a>(std::move(&#42;LastError), errorCorruptRecord());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastError = errorCorruptRecord();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ++NumBadIndices;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This type index is invalid. Remap this to &quot;not translated by cvpack&quot;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and return failure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Idx = Untranslated;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a> = remapAllTypes(Types))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we found bad indices but no other errors, try doing another pass and see</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if we can resolve the indices that weren&#39;t in the map on the first pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This may require multiple passes, but we should always make progress. MASM</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is the only known CodeView producer that makes type streams that aren&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// topologically sorted. The standard library contains MASM-produced objects,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so this is important to handle correctly, but we don&#39;t have to be too</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// efficient. MASM type streams are usually very small.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LastError &amp;&amp; NumBadIndices &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BadIndicesRemaining = NumBadIndices;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    IsSecondPass = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumBadIndices = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurIndex = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/typeindex">TypeIndex</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/typeindex/#a79c2f8f476f8287d14a1c154d9eae2e7">TypeIndex::FirstNonSimpleIndex</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a> = remapAllTypes(Types))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NumBadIndices &lt;= BadIndicesRemaining &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;second pass found more bad indices&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LastError &amp;&amp; NumBadIndices == BadIndicesRemaining) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9999bd897fc8a1648bd69b36fee2d357">llvm::make&#95;error&lt;CodeViewError&gt;</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a0e494c491fad71e29cc10efce7c59f6ca7e4105e7f11aef8db54945155c4b3907">cv&#95;error&#95;code::corrupt&#95;record</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Input type graph contains cycles&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LastError)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::move(&#42;LastError);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> TypeStreamMerger::remapAllTypes(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a3b5a871028c3a00c356376368d4d57d9">CVTypeArray</a> &amp;Types) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamref">BinaryStreamRef</a> Stream = Types.getUnderlyingStream();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> Buffer;</span></CodeLine>
